head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths EINHORN, MAY STERN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths EINHORN, MAY STERN

block.p: EINHORN-May Stern. Beloved wife of the late Richard. Loving and cherished mother and mother-in-law of Martin and Beth. Adored grandmother to Richie and Annabelle. She will be deeply missed by her family and friends. Funeral services at Parkside Memorial Chapel, 98-60 Queens Blvd., Tuesday, June 20, 11:15 AM. Those who wish may send contributions to the Alzheimer's Association.
